content.prompt: Assume the income elasticity of demand for good Z equals âˆ’5.0. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: Good Z is a normal good.
Good Z must have an inelastic demand.
An increase in income will lead to a decrease in demand.
An increase in income will lead to an increase in demand.
The income effect of a price increase will be a decrease in quantity demanded at every price.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
